channel.title: Cant change "multicore render" option
channel.description:
It is not a big problem but on my computer I got lot of freezes during game when its on. And I have some sound timing/volume problems tat may be the reason.
Another bug is crossbow reload time: after you shoot nock is fast, when reload it is slow. Also a crossbow should have less sensitivity when aiming + when aiming fps is low.
ps game using russian as menu language ps ps thanks for the game ^_^

item.title: Cant change "multicore render" option
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Black Mesa uses source sdk base 2007 which doesn’t support the multicore rendering option.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant change "multicore render" option
item.dc:creator: Mr.T
item.description:
DrHitman27:

Can’t change “Multicore Render” option

I think it’s just because that feature isn’t implemented in BMS.

Read full topic
